projects.title: GPS Tracking Software
projects.description: Advanced GPS tracking software for Lsiaa company with real-time location monitoring, route optimization, and analytics dashboard. Built using data science techniques for predictive analysis.

projects.title: Tour and Travel Website
projects.description: Full-stack web application for travel booking and management system with payment integration, user authentication, and itinerary planning features.

projects.title: SIH 2023 Problem Statement 19
projects.description: Innovative solution developed for Smart India Hackathon 2023 addressing problem statement 19. Implemented as a team leader with a focus on scalable architecture and user experience.

projects.title: Waste Classification
projects.description: Machine learning project for classifying different types of waste using image recognition technology. Built with Python and TensorFlow to help with waste management and recycling efforts.

projects.title: Contract Analyzer
projects.description: Advanced contract analysis tool that uses natural language processing to extract key terms, obligations, and risks from legal documents. Helps legal teams review contracts more efficiently.
